com.pega.pegarules.pub.services.jsr94

Class PRuleServiceProviderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.rules.RuleServiceProvider
      • com.pega.pegarules.pub.services.jsr94.PRuleServiceProviderImpl

  • public class PRuleServiceProviderImpl
extends javax.rules.RuleServiceProvider
    The PRuleServiceProvider class is the provider class of JSR-94 implementation of PegaRULES in versions 5.1 and above. It provides single point access to all other classes of this implementation.

      • getRuleRuntime

        public javax.rules.RuleRuntime getRuleRuntime()
                                       throws javax.rules.ConfigurationException
        It returns the RuleRuntime of pegaRULES. Service records defined in pegaRULES can be activated through this RuleRuntime.
        Specified by:
        getRuleRuntime in class javax.rules.RuleServiceProvider
        Returns:
        RuleRuntime A Runtime for the service record.
        Throws:
        javax.rules.ConfigurationException
